title: Update within Windows 10/Resolution Problem/FPS in game TRASHED (05-07 FPS)
body: So my computer forced update itself when i turned it on. When I logged in, I noticed my resolution was enlarged. I was able to find a fix to it but then when I got into game (ranked unfortunately) my FPS sat between 5 and 7 the whole time. I literally could not play. Im trying to look for a solution to this problem at the moment. Has anyone experienced this issue or know a fix to it? Help would be much appreciated! Thanks!

replies.body:
There are a number of things that could be causing this. Since you specifically mentioned this happened after the Windows 10 update, I'd recommend [disabling the Windows Game Bar feature](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) that was updated in the most recent updates. This has been causing FPS issues and system freezes for some players, so I think it's a pretty good place to start.

Let me know if your FPS issues persist through that change.

Hello, are you a Windows 10 user who got a recent W10 Anniversary update? Please have a look at these threads:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/gdEazY7E-fps-at-like-2-or-3-recently-all-game-need-help-ever-scince-a-windows-update?comment=0000 
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/KFxcVtYK-my-computer-is-randomly-freeezing-mid-game?comment=0000 
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/il5Qxm2w-if-you-are-still-having-the-bugsplat-bug-after-champ-select-read-this 
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes
